abstract: The social media lessons from the latest Gordon Ramsay nightmare. Small-business confidence ticks up. The deficit problem is solved (for now). How to use a six-second video. Would you buy a point-of-sale system from Groupon?

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)

headline.main: This Week in Small Business: Gordon Ramsay Calling!
